item.description: Our annual trek to Rose's Berry Farm in Glastonbury for their "Breakfast with a View." Breakfast is served on the deck at the farm and you can choose from pancakes, waffles, or french toast, topped with the in-season fruit. Should be blueberries in August. Reasonable prices, and a great view. Afterwards shop in their farm store or go pick some berries in the pick-your-own patches.
item.how_to_find_us: Howie is the host and you can't miss him -- he's the tall guy! :-)
item.why: They call it breakfast with a view and it surely is both -- a great breakfast and a great view.
item.name: Brunch on the Deck
